Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2016 02:23PM cams wrote: Hi All! New to this. Had my treatment of epirubicin, cyclophosphamide (EC- European equivalent of AC). On day two post infusion and feeling ok so far. Night time nausea seems the worst. Trying to prop myself when sleeping. Any other hints
Posts.Title: Anyone starting chemo August 2016? MFalabella Kechla
